mapper.select: SELECT ho_staff.ho_hospital_code, ho_staff.staff_level_code, ho_staff.ho_staff_name, ho_staff.HO_HOSPITAL_CODE, ho_hospital.HO_HOSPITAL_NAME, ho_staff_level.STAFF_LEVEL_NAME FROM ho_staff join ho_hospital on ho_staff.HO_HOSPITAL_CODE = ho_hospital.HO_HOSPITAL_CODE join ho_staff_level on ho_staff.STAFF_LEVEL_CODE = ho_staff_level.STAFF_LEVEL_CODE WHERE ho_staff_id = #{hoStaffId} AND ho_staff_pw=#{hoStaffPw}
